name: Pollinator (Rare Parrot Games)
description:
Pollinator is a clicking-based farming game based on the use of bees on farms to act as crop pollinators.

- Plant fruit and use your beehives to pollinate them.
- When they grow, sell them to expand you farm and buy more bees.
- As your bee population increases, gain access to more bee-dependent fruits.
- Right Click for Panning, Scroll Wheel for Zoom

An average of 29% of bee colonies die every year, and without pollinators many common fruits would greatly decline in availability.
#SaveTheBees

Made for the Regenerate Game Jam.
